alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Mower; Olmsted; Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 23 at 10:39AM CDT until October 24 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Iowa, Mitchell and Floyd Counties. In Minnesota, Wabasha, Dodge, Olmsted and Mower Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 3 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Due to the warm and dry conditions and strong winds, fire weather concerns will be elevated.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Delay outdoor burning until conditions improve.
